metadata.file_purpose: All prompts for character design interactions during story writing
metadata.usage_notes: Used exclusively during story mode design phases. Modify templates to change character design prompts.

character.placeholder: What would you like to name them?
character.usage: When story introduces unnamed character that needs naming

appearance.prompt_template: Help us bring {name} to life! Describe how {name} looks like
appearance.placeholder: Write 1-2 sentences about what they look like
appearance.usage: First aspect prompt after naming or for named characters

dreams.prompt_template: Help give more details to {name}. What does {name} dream of becoming?
dreams.placeholder: Write about their hopes and dreams. They are dreaming to become

skills.prompt_template: Help give more details to {name}. What is {name} amazing at?

flaws.prompt_template: Help us design {name}! Describe a small, relatable flaw
flaws.placeholder: Describe a small, relatable flaw in 1-2 sentences

design_flow.usage_notes: System rotates through aspects to avoid repetition and maintain variety
design_flow.selection_strategy: Choose aspects that haven't been used recently for the current character

story_flow_integration.description: How character design prompts integrate with story progression
trigger_conditions: Story introduces unnamed character requiring naming
Story requires character depth for narrative progression
story_flow_integration.response_handling: Character details get incorporated into subsequent story continuation prompts

educational_benefits.vocabulary_expansion: Suggestion words introduce descriptive vocabulary naturally
educational_benefits.creative_thinking: Open-ended prompts encourage imaginative character development
educational_benefits.writing_skills: Practice describing characters builds descriptive writing abilities
